content.content:
Who we are

We are X-Sport. Our website is: https://xsport .cocomine.cc/

What personal data we collect and why we collect it

We will collect personal information to confirm the booking. When you book an event, your information will be sent to the event owner for confirmation. When you pay for you, the payment information will be given to a third party processing.

The mobile app does not collect any data.

Who we share your data with

Your data may be shared with the following service providers:

  • Google https://policies.google.com/privacy
  • Mapbox https://www.mapbox.com/legal/privacy
  • Stripe https://stripe.com/en-hk/privacy

How long do we keep your data

When the user requests to delete the account, we will delete all user information within three months .

What rights do you have regarding your data

You can always Modify your personal information and other information in the account settings interface. When you request to delete your account, all personal information will be deleted.

You have full control over your mobile application data.

Where do we send your data

When you book an event, your information will be sent to the event owner for confirmation.

The mobile application does not send any data.

Contact

Our contact emailsupport@cocopixelmc.com

Which third parties do we receive data from

When you log in with your Google Account, we will receive your Google Account email address and username

The mobile app and Mapbox will receive your GPS location for searching . This targeting data is not stored on the website.
